text: [Dar oƣoz] Mardum cuz ummati vohid [va jaktoparast] naʙudand, sipas ixtilof kardand.Va agar pestar [dar mavridi muhlat ʙa gunahgoron va hisoʙrasi dar qijomat] suxane az coniʙi Parvardigorat ʙajon nasuda ʙud, jaqinan, [dar hamin dunjo] dar ʙorai onci ʙo ham ixtilof mekunand, mijonason dovari mesud
